alert.note: Alert for Edmunds; Faulk; Hand; Hyde; Potter (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 31 at 1:53AM MDT until March 31 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing drizzle. Additional ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 17 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Edmunds, Potter, Faulk, Hyde and Hand Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 AM CDT this morning. For the Blizzard Warning, from 7 AM this morning to 1 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
